All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddApptController
Add Appointment Controller -- allows appointments to be added to the db.
AddContactController
AddContactController -- adds contacts to the db.
AddCustomerController
AddCustomerController -- adds customers to the db.
AddUserController
AddUserController -- adds users to db only if current user is admin
Appointment
Appointment model class
AppointmentDAO
AppointmentDAO class -- used to connect to the database and allow sql queries, create, update, and deletes.
ApptsController
ApptsController -- Displays tables of appointments, allows appointment deletion, and redirects to add/update appt page.
ChangeView
ChangeView -- reduces redundant code.
Contact
Contact model class.
ContactDAO
ContactDAO -- used to connect to the database and allow sql queries, create, update, and deletes.
ContactsController
ContactsController -- Displays a table contacts, allows contacts to be deleted, and redirects to add/update contacts page
Country
Country model class.
CountryDAO
CountryDAO -- used to connect to the database to allow sql queries.
Customer
Customer model class.
CustomerController
CustomerController -- Displays a table of customers, allows customers to be deleted, and redirects to add/update customer page
CustomerDAO
CustomerDAO -- used to connect to the database and allow sql queries, create, update, and deletes.
DBConnection
DBConnection -- connects the database to allow queries, creating, updates, and deletes.
Division
First Level Division Class
DivisionDAO
DivisionDAO -- used to connect to the database and allow sql queries
LoginController
LoginController -- Logs the user in, displays the login page in the users current language settings (English or French)
Main
Main -- Main Class launches the Application, establishes/closes connection to db and opens first window LoginView.
MainPageController
MainPageController -- Allows the user to select a specific view to be redirected to.
Messages
Messages class -- custom messages built here.
ReportsController
ReportsController -- displays reports
UpdateApptController
Update Appt Controller -- allows appointments to be updated/modified and saved to the db.
UpdateContactController
UpdateContactController -- updates existing contacts in the db.
UpdateCustomerController
UpdateCustomerController -- updates customers in the db.
UpdateUserController
UpdateUserController -- updates selected user - only if current user is admin
User
User model class
UserController
 
UserDAO
UserDAO -- -- used to connect to the database and allow sql queries, create, update, and deletes.
